title: 3.1 Master Challenge 2
question: Pick a random number between 1 to 999. Assign this number to a variable. Use the nested if- else condition to check and display if the number is a one digit, two digit or three digit number.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
